apihelp-wordcounter-extended-description: The 'WordCounter' API module provides functions to retrieve word counts for individual pages, list pages by word count, and provide overall statistics about words in the wiki.
apihelp-wordcounter-param-limit: Maximum number of results to return.
apihelp-wordcounter-param-offset: Offset for the results to enable pagination.
apihelp-wordcounter-param-pageids: A list of page IDs for which to query word counts.
apihelp-wordcounter-param-sort: Sort order of the results. Possible values are 'asc' (ascending) and 'desc' (descending).
apihelp-wordcounter-param-titles: A list of page titles for which to query word counts.
apihelp-wordcounter-paramvalue-prop-page: Returns a list of pages sorted by word count.
Queries the word count of one or more pages.
apihelp-wordcounter-paramvalue-prop-tota: Returns global statistics about words in pages.
apihelp-wordcounter-paramvalue-prop-unco: Lists pages whose words have not been counted.
apihelp-wordcounter-summary: The API module of the 'WordCounter' extension for counting words in the wiki.
wordcounter-api-error-multi-methods: Either 'titles' or 'pageids' must be specified, not both.
wordcounter-api-error-no-page-specified: At least one page must be specified.
wordcounter-api-help-example-pageids: Queries the word count for one or more pages by their IDs.
wordcounter-api-help-example-pages: Lists pages sorted by word count.
wordcounter-api-help-example-pagewords: Queries the word count for one or more pages by their titles.
wordcounter-api-help-example-totals: Retrieves the total word statistics of the wiki.
wordcounter-api-help-example-uncounted: Lists pages whose words have not been counted.
wordcounter-api-warning-invalid-ns: The namespace of the page '$1' is invalid and will be skipped.
wordcounter-api-warning-invalid-pageid: The page ID '$1' is not supported and will be skipped.
wordcounter-api-warning-invalid-title: The title '$1' is invalid and will be skipped.
wordcounter-desc: Counts words on all content pages, makes them available through parser functions, updates statistics pages, and calculates the total word count of the wiki.
wordcounter-special-mostwords-cache-info: ''This page is cached and was last updated $1. It shows a limit of $2 results.''
wordcounter-special-mostwords-header: This special page lists pages in descending order of their word count.
